newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Trygg-Hansa to release info with report.
newsitem.headline: Trygg-Hansa to release info with report.

text.p: Swedish insurer Trygg-Hansa AB said on Thursday it would release information about a suspension in trading its shares at the same time as it releases its 1996 earnings report later today.
A company spokeswoman Cecilia Schon told Reuters this would be between 1000 GMT and 1100 GMT. The company is due to hold a press conference at 1300 GMT.
The Stockholm bourse announced a trading suspension before the market opened on Thursday. It was last traded at 156 crowns ($21.14).
A Reuters poll has found the market is expecting Trygg-Hansa to post a pre-tax profit of 2.6 billion crowns.
A Swedish media report in March last year said Lars Thunell, the head of Trygg-Hansa, may be interested in a merger between his group and another insurance company or commercial bank.
Market players speculated that Trygg-Hansa was interested in merging with Swedish insurance group Wasa.
